entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
